home.title: My Finance - Budget Management and Incomes, Accounts, Expenses Tracking & Statistics
home.keywords: finance, management, tool, income, expenses, accounts, budget, statistics, analytics
home.description: This is a convenient personal finance management tool designed to help you track income and expenses, manage accounts, and set budget by category, account, and time period. Optimize your finances and achieve your financial goals with detailed statistics and analytics.

budgets.title: Budgets list
budgets.description: Add, edit, and delete budgets. Set budget by category, account, and time period.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Send us a message. We will be happy to help you.

incomes.title: Incomes list
incomes.description: Add, edit, and delete incomes. Track income and expenses.

profile.title: User profile
profile.keywords: profile, user, full name, email, birthdate, gender
profile.description: Edit user profile. Change full name, email, birthdate, gender

accounts.title: Accounts list
accounts.description: Add, edit, and delete accounts. Transfer money between accounts.

expenses.title: Expenses list
expenses.description: Add, edit, and delete expenses. Track income and expenses.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Change settings. Change currency, default period

statistics.title: Total statistics
statistics.keywords: statistics, analytics, categories, accounts, incomes, budgets, period
statistics.description: Track incomes, expenses and budgets by category, account, and time period. Optimize your finances and achieve your financial goals with detailed statistics and analytics.
